headline: Corning Incorporated (GLW): Rising Demand for AI Data Center Optics Amid EU Competition Investigation
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 15 AI Stocks That are Making Headlines. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) stands against the other AI stocks. headline: Three Reasons to Avoid Corning and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Corning’s 33.6% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 20.2%, and its stock price has climbed to $47.90 per share. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
